BVDUCOEP is a constituent unit of Bharati Vidyapeeth (Deemed to be University), accredited with an A+ grade in its third cycle by NAAC in 2017. Bharati Vidyapeeth (Deemed to be University) College of Engineering was established by Dr. Patangrao Kadam in 1983.

patterns: Can you tell me your name?
responses: I am your chatbot!
I don't have a name, but you can call me Chatbot.
I am here to assist you with your queries.

patterns: What time do you open and close?
responses: Our working hours are from 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Friday.
We are open from 9 AM to 5 PM on weekdays.
Office hours are 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday through Friday.

patterns: Tell me about the student clubs
responses: We have a variety of clubs including the Cultural Club, Sports Club, and Tech Club.
Our college offers several student clubs like the Drama Club, Music Club, and Debate Club.
You can join clubs such as the Arts Club, Science Club, and Eco Club.

patterns: Tell me about the IT department
What is the difference between IT and CSE?
responses: The IT department focuses on Information Technology, while the CSE department focuses on Computer Science and Engineering.
Our IT department offers courses in software development and network management, whereas CSE offers courses in algorithms and programming.
The IT department is more oriented towards tech applications, while CSE emphasizes computer systems and software engineering.
We offer a range of courses including Engineering, Business Administration, and Arts.
Our courses include Computer Science, Mechanical Engineering, and Business Management.
Available courses include Information Technology, Civil Engineering, and Electrical Engineering.

The council is made up of key individuals who oversee the institution's governance.
